altername_name: 実況パワフルプロ野球15
name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 15
overview: Jikkyō Powerful Pro Yakyū 15 is one of the many titles in Konami's Power Pro baseball franchise. It features full player rosters for all 12 Central and Pacific league teams, with player data through the 2008 season. Standard league, exhibition, solo career, and home run derby modes are present, along with the series' ubiquitous Success mode featuring two brand new scenarios. There is also a practice mode, and even the ability to compose your own crowd chants. The Wii release also includes a special motion-controlled mode where the player's Miis can be used in-game.
